description: This file defines data models and enumerations related to bug analysis within a code detection tool. It includes classes for request data, detected issues, analysis responses, and severity levels.

classes.name: SeverityLevel
classes.description: Enumeration of severity levels for detected issues: Info, Warning, Error.

classes.name: BugAnalysisRequest
classes.description: Represents the payload for requesting bug analysis, including language, code snippet, and optional filename.

classes.name: DetectedIssue
classes.description: Represents a detected issue in the analyzed code, including severity, message, location, and rule ID.

classes.name: BugAnalysisResponse
classes.description: Contains the results of the bug analysis, including detected issues and summary properties.
